title: Seven Deadly Sins Cake
thumbnail_alt: Colorful slice of a very tall seven-layer cake.

media.caption: Full view of all 7 layers of the cake.
Top of the cake, with sprinkles and a cherry.
Colorful slice of a very tall seven-layer cake.

overview:
The Seven Deadly Sins, in cake form (from bottom to top):

  • Gluttony: Inception Brownies
  • Envy: Green Mint Cake
  • Greed: 100 Grand and Payday candy bars
  • Lust: Silky Red Velvet Cake
  • Sloth: Hostess Cupcakes
  • Pride: American Apple Pie
  • Wrath: Death by Chocolate Cake

Topped with rings of chocolate frosting, Nutella, and vanilla frosting, and garnished with sprinkles and a cherry.
